mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL( a.province,""),IFNULL( a.city,""),IFNULL( a.district,""),IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,"")) AS area, date_format( login.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS loginTime FROM inno72_game_user_login login LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l on l.id=login.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area a ON a.CODE = l.area_code WHERE login.user_id=#{userId}
